Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing and can poison
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Thri-Kreen makes 2 attacks, one with tis Bite and one with its Claws

Abilities.Ability 1: Chameleon Carapace, The Thri-Kreen can change the colour of tis carapace to match the colour and texture of its surroundings, making it incredibly difficult to spot
Abilities.Ability 2: Standing Leap, The Thri-Kreen can long jump up to 30ft and its high jump is 15ft, with or without a running start
